Synopsis: Retrieves information about the RAM of a specified computer.
Description: This function retrieves detailed information about the RAM of a specified computer. It provides various properties such as Manufacturer, Model, Capacity, Speed, and more.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-ComputerRAM -ComputerName "Server01" -Protocol Wsman
Retrieves RAM information from a remote computer named Server01 using the Wsman protocol.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-ComputerRAM -ComputerName "WorkstationA" -All
Retrieves all available RAM properties from a computer named WorkstationA.
